scripts.build: npm install --no-package-lock && npm install --save-dev tailwindcss postcss autoprefixer && node -e "require('fs').existsSync('tailwind.config.js') || require('child_process').execSync('npx tailwindcss init')" && node -e "require('fs').existsSync('postcss.config.js') || require('fs').writeFileSync('postcss.config.js', 'module.exports = {plugins: {tailwindcss: {}, autoprefixer: {},},};')" && NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 npx next build
